attributes.action: make it easier for carers to claim the benifits they are entitled to
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
MANY PEOPLE, INCLUDING SENIOR CITIZENS, ARE ENTITLED TO CLAIM A BENIFIT OR GET SUPPORT IN THE HOME TO HELP 
WHILST TAKING CARE OF THEIR LONG TERM LOVED ONE.  THE SYSTEM DOES NOT ALLOW SUCH PEOPLE TO GET WHAT THEY ARE ENTITLED TO WITHOUT A GREAT DEAL OF INVESTIGATION, RESEARCH AND FORM FILLING.  TO FOLLOW THERE IS A LONG WAIT FOR THE AUTHORITIES TO AGREE TO ANY ENTITLEMENTS TO EVEN NON-MEANS TESTED BENIFITS OR NECESSARY HELP IN THE HOME. OFTEN THE PROCESS INVOLVES MAKING AN APPEAL.   
THE CURRENT SYSTEM IS NOT USER FRIENDLY OR CARING AND OFTEN SERVICES PROMISED ARE NOT IMPLEMENTED DUE TO UNDERFUNDED SERVICE PROVISION AT LOCAL LEVEL.  PLEASE REVIEW THE CURRENT SYSTEM.

rejection.details: Please resubmit without using BLOCK CAPS as they are more difficult for people to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
